Translations.Text: yataksana na tomara kabare upanita ha'o
Kakhano naya, tomara sighra'i janate parabe
tarapara, kakhano naya, tomara sighra'i janate parabe
kakhano naya! Yadi tomara niscita jnane jnani hate
tarapara abasya'i tomara ta dekhabe caksusa pratyaye
tarapara abasya'i sedina tomaderake neyamata samparke prasna kara habe
